Title: Putting the Works in Waterworks
Description:
Overly-enthusiastic kobolds, angry elementals, and a broken-down power plant. This place is in shambles!

Do you spot those large wheels on each side? They should be moving, but they're not. We'll need to get those moving again if we want this place to come back to life.
CompletionText: I wonder if we could use this technology to rebuild the Stonewrought Dam? Wouldn't that be something.
RewardText:
Wowiee look at it go! 

Just a fraction of Azeroth's power, harnessed for its protection.
